General.Name: El Al Israel Airlines Ltd
General.Description: El Al Israel Airlines Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides passenger and cargo transportation services. The company operates flights on passenger and cargo to direct destinations in countries in Europe, the United States, Asia, Far East, and Africa. It offers aircraft maintenance services; sells duty-free products; produces and supplies food to airlines; security services to aviation; and operates a loyalty club. The company also produces and supplies prepared kosher meals to airlines and institutions. In addition, it provides catering services to institutions; and markets tour packages and airline tickets to travel agents and individual passengers, as well as operates various restaurants. The company was incorporated in 1948 and is headquartered in Lod, Israel.
